body_html: After re-reading the change: all those define will have to go in an external repository to make the import TF as a workspace works nicely, unfortunately there is no vardef so you probably wants to write a bzl file with those variable defined with an external repository (either as a follow-up or as part of this change).

body: After re-reading the change: all those define will have to go in an external repository to make the import TF as a workspace works nicely, unfortunately there is no vardef so you probably wants to write a bzl file with those variable defined with an external repository (either as a follow-up or as part of this change).
